# StaticKit

> StaticKit is a free, open-source AI image editor that connects to Google's Gemini API using your own API key. Professional photo editing without subscriptions.

## About

StaticKit provides a polished interface for AI-powered image editing. Instead of writing prompts or wrestling with API documentation, you get one-click presets, natural language editing, background replacement, model swaps, and smart resizing.

Key features:
- Bring Your Own Key (BYOK) model - use your own Google AI API key
- No watermarks on output
- No subscription fees
- Natural language editing ("make the sky more dramatic")
- One-click lighting and style presets
- Background replacement
- Subject/model swapping
- Smart aspect ratio resizing

Website: https://statickit.ai
